title: Dr. Goldfoot and the Bikini Machine

sources.title: Dr Goldfoot and the Bikini Machine (1965) : Vincent Price movie
sources.description: Dr Goldfoot and the Bikini Machine (1965) Film comedy starring Vincent Price . A James Bond spoof. The title spoofs the Bond films Dr No and Goldfinger , as Dr Goldfoot.  A mad scientist (Vincent Price) builds an android machine, which manufactures dozens of beautiful girl androids in bikinis. Wacky Sixties science fiction comedy. Vincent Price is excellent as the mad genius who wants to use his invention to rule the world. Movie poster

metadata.Plot: Dr. Goldfoot plans on taking over the world with his beautiful female robots, who seduce rich and powerful men. Robot #11/Diane is sent after millionaire Todd Armstrong. Secret agent Craig Gamble tries to stop the plot but ends up in the torture chamber with Armstrong. The parody of "The Pit and the Pendulium" is the highlight of the film which also includes bits by Annette Funicello, Harvey Lembeck and Deborah Walley.
metadata.Writer: Elwood Ullman, Robert Kaufman, James H. Nicholson
metadata.Actors: Vincent Price, Frankie Avalon, Dwayne Hickman
